generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is a portable air conditioner with an ion purifier that is suitable for daily lives in urban areas.

Tone: informative, convincing, scientific

Audience: health care consumers, college students, salesman

Aspects 1 : QOOLA can be used for air cooling and heating in the range of 15~45 celcius degree.

Aspects 2 : QOOLA contains stainless steel plate which can cool or heat body instantly.

Aspects 3 : 4 cooling and heating modes for every customer's needs

Aspects 4 : Negative ion purifier can filter contaminants such as micro dust, pollens nearby user.
generations.text: Looking for a quality air conditioner? Look no further than QOOLA! Our portable air conditioner with ion purifier is perfect for daily use in urban areas.

generations.text: QOOLA is a portable air conditioner with an ion purifier that is perfect for daily lives in cities. It can cool or heat in the range of 15-45 degrees Celsius, and comes with 4 cooling and heating modes for every customer's needs. The ion purifier can filter contaminants such as micro dust, pollens, and other harmful toxins, making it a safe and reliable choice for health care consumers, college students, and salesmen.

generations.text: Looking for a way to stay cool and comfortable during the hot summer months? Look no further than QOOLA, the portable air conditioner that is perfect for daily use in urban areas. QOOLA features a stainless steel plate that instantly cools or heats your body, 4 cooling and heating modes to suit your needs, and a negative ion purifier to filter out contaminants such as micro dust and pollens. So don't suffer through the heat wave – get a QOOLA today!

generations.text: There are so many portable air conditioners on the market, but QOOLA is the best for people who live in urban areas. Not only does it cool or heat the air, but it also purifies it with negative ions. QOOLA is made with a stainless steel plate that cools or heats the body instantly, and it has 4 different modes to choose from. Whether you need to cool down after a hot day or warm up on a cold day, QOOLA has you covered.
